EmailTemplate.name: TriTech.com IQ Demonstration.Invitation (VisiNet)
EmailTemplate.subject: Webinar: Discover the Power of IQ in the Cloud
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
STAY CONNECTEDÂ <http://www.facebook.com/pages/Tritech-Software-Systems/89416081839> <http://twitter.com/tritechsoftware> <http://www.linkedin.com/companies/tritech-software-systems> <http://www.youtube.com/user/TriTechSoftware> Discover the Power of TriTech.com IQ Cloud-based public safety search and analytics In 2012, TriTech released Inform IQ, an innovative public safety search and analytics suite, and it instantly became an APCO Hot Product. <http://psc.apcointl.org/2012/10/26/2012-hot-products/> IQ gives communications center personnel the power of free-text search, real-time notifications, and ad hoc reporting and analysis capabilities to deliver information quickly and securely. In 2013, we're taking IQ to the next step by packaging it into a secure, cloud-based solution hosted at the Nlets <http://www.nlets.org>facility with affordable subscription-model pricing.
Please join us for an upcoming webinar to learn how TriTech.com IQ will benefit your agency. In this webinar, you'll discover:
- The power of the Public Safety Search Engine and real-time notifications - The intelligence from centralized reporting and analytics - The ease of access from any location and any device - The cost benefits of operating on a cloud-based platform - The security of Nlets hosting services
Click here <http://offers.tritech.com/TriTech.comIQDemonstration_Registration.html>to register: http://offers.tritech.com/TriTech.comIQDemonstration_Registration.html <http://offers.tritech.com/TriTech.comIQDemonstration_Registration.html>
Join us for a demonstration Webinar Details Date: Thursday, April 11
Time: 2:00 PM Eastern Time (1 PM CT | Noon MT | 11 AM PT)
Presenters: Wendy Gilbert, Director of Product Management and Charlie Barry, Senior Product Manager
